mapper.select: select Count(*) as result from admin_graphs where dates = to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')
mapper.insert: insert into admin_graphs( date_id , dates , users_cnt , restaurant_cnt , visit_cnt ) values (date_id_seq.nextval, to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd'), 0, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE admin_graphs SET users_cnt = users_cnt + #{users_cnt}, restaurant_cnt = restaurant_cnt + #{restaurant_cnt}, visit_cnt = visit_cnt + #{visit_cnt} WHERE dates = to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')
